derivation: the same as H424 (אֵלָה)lemma אִלָה first vowel, corrected to אֵלָה;
outline:
Elah = "An oak"
  1. an Edomite chief
  2. a king of Israel for two years, son of Baasha
  3. the father of king Hoshea of Israel
  4. a son of Caleb
  5. son of Uzzi
strongs_def: Elah, the name of an Edomite, of four Israelites, and also of a place in Palestine
